meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lynn Klyde-Allaman Natasha Go Rebecca Zoshak Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7724.

td.p: Lynn Klyde-Allaman, a journalism professor from Lafayette, Colorado
Natasha Go, an innovation strategist from Sunnyside, New York
Rebecca Zoshak, a language specialist from State College, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,407)

tr.td: NEWS OF 2017
MIDDLE INITIAL E.
FUN WITH BACKWARDS WORDS
LOCATION VACATION
ON THE BOARD GAME
LET'S REWRITE THE CLASSIC NOVEL

')
